皇馬官網表示巴利左腿比目魚肌有水腫情況，但不是更為嚴重的肌肉纖維撕裂。

巴利在皇馬客場3-1擊敗多特的比賽中取得了一粒進球，但並沒有參加此後同愛斯賓奴的聯賽。此前威爾斯國家隊已經確認，巴利無法參加接下來威爾斯同格魯吉亞以及愛爾蘭的世預賽比賽。

自從加盟皇家馬德里以來，巴利前後有大約300天的時間在養傷。由於接受了腳踝手術，上個賽季巴利缺席了28場比賽。

咪係

法國和西班牙是比鄰，兩國被比利牛斯山脈阻隔，但無論歷史還是文化都一衣帶，加泰隆尼亞地區與法國更是淵源頗深。加泰隆尼亞語就與法語相似，巴塞隆拿超過六成的居民都會講法語，而法國南部地區不少人也會説加泰語。

此前，在巴塞隆拿進行維護加泰隆尼亞文化活動時，就曾請來前時任法國主帥杜明尼治及國腳圖拿姆和久利等人。在2015年10月，加泰欲進行獨立公投之際，法國時任總理瓦爾斯更是直接表示：自己從小就是巴塞的超級球迷，會張開雙臂歡迎巴塞到來。他還認為法甲會接納巴塞這樣的球隊。

法甲近年來隨着巴黎和摩納哥的崛起，一直希望拓展其聯賽的商業價值。賽季初在尼馬加盟後，法國足球聯盟就對巴西人表示熱烈歡迎，並表示聯賽水平會得到顯著提高。此番若巴塞來投，法甲會相當開心。況且加泰隆尼亞到法甲各比賽城市的距離非常近，從巴塞隆拿到尼斯和圖盧茲開車只需兩小時，到馬賽三小時，到巴黎與到馬德里距離相同。

法甲引入其他國家球隊參賽，早有先例，摩納哥俱樂部就是摩納哥公國的代表。在1933年，受法國足協邀請，成為了一家職業足球俱樂部，隨後便一直是法國足球系統的一部分。他們曾經7次獲得過法甲聯賽冠軍。上賽季更是打入歐聯半決賽。

對於加入巴塞的程序，在法國相對簡單，不同於西班牙，還需要議會通過，並修改體育法等，只要法國足協成員投票通過，巴塞基本就可前來參賽，最為關鍵的一點是，他們可以不用從法丙一步步開始，如果多數投票贊成，他們甚至可以直接參加法甲。

今年夏天，賓菲加後衞林德洛夫以3500萬歐元的轉會費加盟曼聯，不過他的處境有些尷尬。


截至目前，23歲的瑞典後衞只為紅魔出場4次，且沒有1次英超出場記錄。在接受瑞典《快報》記者採訪時林德洛夫表示自己和摩連奴有過“不錯的對話”。

林德洛夫表示：“現在的我沒感覺到壓力，曼聯是世界最大的俱樂部之一，我在為這樣一支球隊效力。當然會有競爭，也許我只是需要時間，我和摩連奴也有過不錯的交流。”

《每日郵報》表示林德洛夫的表現引起了一些批評，特別是賽季前在歐洲超級盃中的表現。

小花

阿根廷出線世盃決賽周成疑，正值用人之時，難得美斯與保羅戴巴拿均在球會狀態大勇，好應一同落場殺敵，但森柏奧利指，戴巴拿不會在周今場關鍵戰正選上陣。

這位前智利國家隊教頭這樣解釋：「現在沒有時間讓美斯與戴巴拿去擦出火花，一切都講求具體。我知道戴巴拿希望與美斯一齊上陣，但他很難找到一個合適的位置，因為美斯必須像在球會一樣踢得自由，而我們的戰術要圍繞他，當排出4-2-3-1陣式時，他可以移前靠近禁區，又可以撤後組織進攻。我的工作就是要讓他明白自己在三閘線後有多重要。」

森柏奧利這樣說，意味著戴巴拿或要改變踢法，才能與美斯一同上陣，又或要等到成功晉級後，再慢慢去研究可共融兩人的陣型或戰術變化。

政治正確到。。。

Four positions that Mourinho should already be scouting for in preparation for next summer
ByJosh Gmerek-IftakharPosted on October 5, 2017

After coming off the back of a hectic summer period, one that was full of continuous gossip and speculation, the mention of the word ‘transfer’, is one that fans like to block out from now until at least January. However, behind closed doors at every football club across the world, the scouting and negotiating of players never stops. So which areas of the team should Jose Mourinho be considering scouting, in preparation for next Summer’s transfer window.

RIGHT-BACK

Although the current right-back spot is comfortably taken up by Antiono Valencia, the Ecuadorian turned 32 last August and after Mourinho publically admitting that he will need to be used cautiously this season, the signing of a younger right-back would certainly provide as an efficient investment. Manchester United down the years have always boasted in possessing two attacking full-backs, that like to offer support in attacks for their partnered winger and attacking midfielders.

Valencia has certainly been a player who has fitted the bill for the last three years now, consistently occupying that position as his own without any real competition. As a player that has certainly come on and matured in recent years, he is at the perfect stage in his career to take on a mentor at the club.

Although fans may argue that Fosu-Mensah is destined to take this role, there does come the point as to whether this is the Dutchman’s best position, as he has been playing as a central defender during his loan spell at Crystal Palace. Perhaps the acquisition of a more natural, but still young, right-back, would provide as more efficient business.

Potential options; Thomas, Meunier, Benjamin Henriches, Kelvin Amian.

RIGHT WINGER

The most depleted area in the current squad is arguably the amount of natural wingers that United hold, particularly on the right flank. Although the interchanging between Juan Mata and Henrikh Mkhitaryan out on that side has worked effectively so far this season, there is certainly no plan B when it comes to putting a winger out on the right hand side.

As mentioned, United like to operate with two attacking full-backs and specifically under Mourinho, they prefer to play with wide players that have the intelligence to come inside and thus make room for the overlapping full-back. It seems that in the modern game there seems to be less ‘old fashioned’ wingers and more inside forwards, that like to operate out wide, similar to how United set out on the left flank with Anthony Martial and Marcus Rashford. In the current squad, there is no natural right winger and thus the signing of a new one, would provide United an alternative option to their attacking line.

Potential options; Thomas Lemar, Gelson Martins, Domenico Berardi, Christian Pulisic.

STRIKER

With Marcus Rashford predominantly operating out on the left under Mourinho, another area of the team that is heavily depleted is the striking department. Although Romelu Lukaku is the name on everybody’s lips at present, if the big Belgian were to get injured, United lack alternatives to play up top.


Especially with Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s return date still unknown, there is evidently a very high reliance on Lukaku to lead the attacking line week in, week out. Although goals haven’t been an issue so far this season, another striking addition to the squad would certainly be welcomed with welcome arms and one that would benefit the team in the long run.

Potential options; Timo Werner, Kasper Dolberg, Mauro Icardi.

LEFT-BACK

As oppose to the right-back spot, United have been relying on multiple players to fill in at left-back, over the last two years now. Arguably however, the only reason that United would need to recruit a new left-back, would be dependent on Luke Shaw’s fitness. The Englishman has experienced a rather torrid time, after his horror set back against PSV back in 2015.

If Shaw can get back on track then that left-back spot can be solidified for the next decade, but at present, there is certainly an outbalanced look to the side, without a natural left-footer there. Perhaps there would be no harm in exploring the options for this position, even if it doesn’t appear as a priority at the moment.

Potential options; Danny Rose, Kieran Tierney, Alex Sandro.

Watch Cesc Fabregas reveal on A League Of Their Own that he was the man who threw pizza at Sir Alex Ferguson at Old Trafford at 2004

Cesc Fabregas has finally confessed he threw pizza at Sir Alex Ferguson during the famous 'Battle of the Buffet' at Old Trafford.

The Chelsea midfielder had long been suspected as the culprit in 2004 after Manchester United had beaten Arsenal 2-0 to end their 49-game unbeaten Premier League run and he has confessed on Sky One's A League Of Their Own.

On the upcoming episode, host James Corden asks Fabregas: "Tonight, can we finally put the case of the flying pizza to bed once and for all? Were you the culprit that thew the pizza?"

"Yes," replied Fabregas.

"All of a sudden, I heard noises (from the tunnel) and I thought what's happening? So I go out with my slice of pizza and I saw Sol Campbell, Rio Ferdinand, Martin Keown... everyone pushing each other.

Martin Keown's clash with Ruud van Nistelrooy in 2003
Martin Keown's clash with Ruud van Nistelrooy in 2003

"I was like, I want to get in but I don't know how to and I threw... peeew... just threw it. Once I saw it was hitting, like, who it was hitting, which I didn't mean…"

Fabregas confirmed the pizza hit Ferguson in the face and added: "I apologise Sir Alex, really didn't mean to do that!"

The game itself was given extra spice due to Keown's treatment of Ruud van Nistelrooy in the same fixture a year earlier, after the United striker had missed a penalty.

PSG defender Thomas Meunier admits frustration with French club

MANCHESTER UNITED fan Thomas Meunier has put the club on red alert after admitting he is frustrated at PSG.

By Aaron Stokes / Published 6th October 2017
Thomas MeunierGetty

Thomas Meunier is a huge Manchester United fan and has been linked with the club in the past
The Belgian has been a transfer target for the Red Devils in the past.

He also declared his love for the club in an interview over the summer.

And with Jose Mourinho eyeing potential long-term replacements for Antonio Valencia, Meunier's unhappiness may put the wheels in motion.

Speaking to L'Equipe about whether he was disgruntled, the 26-year-old responded: "Yes, because I want to play every match, whether it’s against Gueugnon, Niort or Bayern Munich.

"I want to be on the pitch every time. I am in a team which is one of the top five in the world where the back-ups and the starters are about the same level."

“I want to play every match, whether it’s against Gueugnon, Niort or Bayern Munich”
Thomas Meunier
Last season, Meunier battled with Spurs star Serge Aurier for the right-back position at PSG.

But after the Frenchman left for North London in the summer, Meunier was joined by Brazilian star Dani Alves.

And the former Barcelona man has kept Meunier out of the side in recent months.

"For me, Serge and Dani are equal," he added.

"Dani has experience and he is a leader on the pitch.

Thomas MeunierGetty

Thomas Meunier wanted Eden Hazard to join him at PSG in the summer
"It takes a bit of luck sometimes. I see the choices of the coach. I just have to be patient for now, because I’m not the priority.

"But I will do everything to complicate the choices as much as possible when I play.

"I do what I can and I usually play good matches, which is important for the technical staff because they know they can count on me, but they already knew that last season."

Just last month Meunier pleaded with countryman Eden Hazard to join him in France.

STRIKER

With Marcus Rashford predominantly operating out on the left under Mourinho, another area of the team that is heavily depleted is the striking department. Although Romelu Lukaku is the name on everybody’s lips at present, if the big Belgian were to get injured, United lack alternatives to play up top.


Especially with Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s return date still unknown, there is evidently a very high reliance on Lukaku to lead the attacking line week in, week out. Although goals haven’t been an issue so far this season, another striking addition to the squad would certainly be welcomed with welcome arms and one that would benefit the team in the long run.

Potential options; Timo Werner, Kasper Dolberg, Mauro Icardi.

LEFT-BACK

As oppose to the right-back spot, United have been relying on multiple players to fill in at left-back, over the last two years now. Arguably however, the only reason that United would need to recruit a new left-back, would be dependent on Luke Shaw’s fitness. The Englishman has experienced a rather torrid time, after his horror set back against PSV back in 2015.

If Shaw can get back on track then that left-back spot can be solidified for the next decade, but at present, there is certainly an outbalanced look to the side, without a natural left-footer there. Perhaps there would be no harm in exploring the options for this position, even if it doesn’t appear as a priority at the moment.

Potential options; Danny Rose, Kieran Tierney, Alex Sandro.

Sir Alex Ferguson ahead of Sir Bobby Charlton's 80th birthday (born 11 October 1937): "The great thing about Bobby Charlton is how he’s handled the greatness. Success can change people, and it’s never changed Bobby Charlton. He is what he is: quiet, shy and I think it’s fantastic. An example for anyone who enters football. He has never forgotten his roots. That girl Norma has been his rock, all his life. She’s an unbelievable person and that is a great partnership.
I think he was responsible for me getting the job at Manchester United. We used to go to games all the time - although I don’t think Bobby enjoyed my driving! - so it was a great introduction.
We lost the league by drawing at West Ham in the last game of the season, when Blackburn beat us by one point (in 1995). The dressing room was dead. There’s nothing you can say.
Bobby came in said: ‘I’m so proud of you all. You’ve represented Manchester United in the best possible way. You’ve done your best.’ And then he went around and shook everyone’s hand. I’ll never forget it. A friend is someone you can rely on all the time and that’s the case with Bobby. He’ll never let me down".

Eric Cantona: "He (Sir Bobby Charlton) is Manchester United. I think his car can drive there by itself. He can go there with his eyes closed... When I was warming up, I knew he was in the stands and sometimes I thought about that. I never said this before but sometimes I thought: ‘Maybe he’ll be looking at me so I’ll try to do something nice so that he’ll like it.’ I think he’s a masterpiece of the game. He has a big presence and charisma. He is the heart of the family...I wish him a Happy Birthday. BobbyW, I would like to thank you for everything you did for us and you still do for the club. If we have won some things it is because of a strong figure like you. You gave us all the confidence we needed to win things."

目前，沙維正效力於華倫西亞青年隊，據悉他的右腳能力十分出眾，他也經常被拿來與碧咸相比較。

2015年，作為華倫西亞主帥加利尼維利的助教，小尼維利把沙維帶到了華倫西亞。雖然隨着加利尼維利的下課，小尼維利也離開了瓦倫，但是沙維選擇了留下，並憑藉着自己的表現獲得了續約。除了曼聯之外，熱刺也對沙維感興趣。

返工囉

近日，艾歷拜利接受了曼聯官方刊物《United Review》的專訪，他在專訪中談到了中堅競爭、摩連奴、更衣室等話題。


如何評價本賽季球隊的表現？

我覺得球隊表現得很好，我們踢了那麼多比賽，一場沒有輸過，這對整支球隊來説都很重要。萬事開頭難，一個好的開局能給好的結尾做鋪墊。在我個人看來這是挺好的，但是沒有什麼事情是最好的，你總能做到更好。我對自己的狀態很滿意，但是還有提高的空間。在有限的機會裏，你必須要去取得進步。

你和菲爾-鍾斯的組合令人印象深刻，你如何評價你們的合作？

我和菲爾-鍾斯的關係挺好的，跟其他兩名中衞林德洛夫和史摩寧的關係也是如此，儘管我們還沒有機會一起出場過。

在我看來這種情況挺好的，因為現在有四名中堅，所以當主教練給我們機會的時候我們會不遺餘力去展現自己。認真去防守然後儘量少丟球，這就是我們的目標。

落河就快回歸了，中衞的競爭會更加激烈。

當然了，我認為這很殘酷，對於我們年輕球員來説，一刻都不能讓自己停下，這很重要。我們需要不停地努力，因為稍不留神，機會就被別人搶去了。但這是一種良性競爭，對球隊是有幫助的，這也是我們競爭的目的。

摩連奴幫助你取得了哪些進步？

對我來説，這些進步都是很重要的，我能看到自己的進步，但是我還有進步的空間。老實説，是在戰術意識和注意力集中方面還有待提高。對於一名年輕的後衞來説這真的挺重要的，能在摩連奴手下踢球，我對未來充滿了期待。

摩連奴在陣容方面最近都做出了輪換，你覺得這對一支強隊來説有多重要？

這對我們來説很重要，對球隊以及主教練來説也是如此。只有當你面臨競爭的時候，你才會想着去改進自己，我不認為有誰能在球隊中高枕無憂，輕而易舉就得保證自己的位置。

你在英格蘭已經獲得了兩個重要的錦標，今年你的目標是什麼？

一名球員總是會想着去贏得榮譽，不是嗎？即便我們不是每次都會走到最後，但是我們依然要繼續下去。我懷揣着很多夢想，感謝上帝，我們接下來會對那些榮譽發起衝擊。

上賽季的奪冠經驗會幫助現在的曼聯嗎？

這是對我們的激勵，但是經驗方面可能幫助不會很大，獲得冠軍錦標非常重要，這會讓你有動力去贏得下一個。我們要有這樣的渴望，目標就是要去贏得下一個獎盃，這對一名球員的職業生涯來説是件好事。

2017年在奧脫福進行的英超比賽只丟了1球，新賽季三個主場1球未丟。你和其他後衞一定很自豪吧！

當然了，這是一名後衞的關鍵數據，儘可能少丟球，讓丟球數為0，希望我們在賽季開局階段的好表現能幫助我們成為今年的關鍵。

在奧脫福已經一年沒有輸球了，這會給你們帶來很大的信心嗎？

我真的挺高興的，因為你可以看到我們很難在主場被擊敗，事實上我們也沒有輸過一場比賽。這給我們帶來了很多的自信以及快樂，就像我之前説的，這對我們對支持我們的球迷們來説都很重要。我希望這能夠繼續下去，因為那樣我們就會有充足的信心去進行客場的比賽，這對我們很重要。

現在曼聯經常以大比分獲勝，對此你有什麼想説的


於去年球隊的情況相比，今年球隊進步挺大的。我們沒有什麼糟糕的表現，今年在一些方面也取得了進步，所以我們對目前的情況挺滿意的。我希望這種勢頭能夠保持下去，因為我們今年的成績會比上賽季進步很多。

今年球隊有更多對榮譽的渴望，我們所有的努力也得到了更多的收穫。球隊擁有一個好的開局這非常重要。我認為這是大家努力訓練以及教練團隊制定戰術得當的結果。我們會繼續這樣下去，這能幫助我們去贏得英超冠軍。

迪基亞的重要性。

在我看來，擁有他是很棒的，他是這個世界上最好的防守球員，最好的門將。他在場上會給我們很多自信。迪基亞真的非常重要，他不僅能給自己身前的後衞信心，也能給全隊帶來信心，這就是他重要的地方。
